alert.note: Alert for Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 6:21AM EST until December 22 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire...Maine... Androscoggin River At Gorham affecting Oxford and Coos Counties. Androscoggin River Near Auburn affecting Cumberland, Sagadahoc and Androscoggin Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Androscoggin River at Gorham. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Flooding begins at the parking lot of businesses along Main Street north of Church Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage by this evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
